details.brokersummary:
Spacious new development in prime Bushwick!
Be the first to live here. Incredible 2 bedroom 1 bath with all the bells and whistles. Great shared backyard space! Laundry in the unit, dishwasher, and central AC. Top of the line stainless steel appliances. Each bedroom is on the opposite side for ultimate privacy, with a big living room/kitchen area in between. The exposed brick and beams add a dynamic element to the apartment.
The building features a gorgeous roof deck with skyline views, and comfy patio furniture for your enjoyment. Storage in the basement.
Myrtle-Wyckoff L and M trains just 1 block away. Surrounded by top rated restaurants and bars - Dromedary Tiki Bar, Milk & Pull Coffee, L'imprimerie Bakery, Boobie Trap Bar, Bushwick Burger Co, Williamsburg Pizza, and many more.
Small pets welcome No broker fee

Myspace Exclusive! Gorgeous renovation in historic prewar building steps from the Myrtle JMZ in prime Bushwick, only a short stroll from the Morgan/Jefferson L!
This beautiful two bedroom features high ceilings, exposed brick, custom moldings, separate eat-in kitchen w/ island, dishwasher, separate living room with tons of natural light, two evenly sized queen bedrooms with closets, lovely hardwood floors, tons of natural light in every room, washer/dryer in unit, additional coat/storage closet in hallway leading to luxe modern bathroom w/ deep soaking tub.
Tucked away from street noise on the second floor facing the back of the property, you will sleep sound! Surrounded by the best selection of bars, restaurants, music/art venues, thrift shops, grocery stores, and transportation options! Steps from Myrtle JMZ express to Lower Manhattan, or a short stroll to the L train at either Morgan or Jefferson!
Only first & security! Heat & hot water included!

Myspace Exclusive! Beautiful pre-war 2 bedroom in Prime Williamsburg
Located at Roebling and South 3rd --- 4 minutes to the Marcy JMZ
2 big sunny bedrooms real living room with great layout ? fits a sofa, coffee table and TV separate kitchen tons of natural light in all rooms
Includes heat and hot water
NO BROKER FEE

Myspace Exclusive! Gorgeous renovation in historic prewar building steps from the Myrtle JMZ in prime Bushwick, only a short stroll from the Morgan/Jefferson L!
This beautiful two bedroom features high ceilings, exposed brick, custom moldings, separate eat-in kitchen w/ island, dishwasher, separate living room with tons of natural light, two evenly sized queen bedrooms with closets, lovely hardwood floors, tons of natural light in every room, washer/dryer in unit, additional coat/storage closet in hallway leading to luxe modern bathroom w/ deep soaking tub.
Tucked away from street noise on the second floor facing the back of the property, you will sleep sound! Surrounded by the best selection of bars, restaurants, music/art venues, thrift shops, grocery stores, and transportation options! Steps from Myrtle JMZ express to Lower Manhattan, or a short stroll to the L train at either Morgan or Jefferson!
Only first & security! Heat & hot water included!

Fabulous 2 bedroom in a classic elevator prewar Williamsburg building. EXCLUSIVE!
Fully renovated with gorgeous hardwood floors and tons of natural light streaming in. Complete with dishwasher. You?ll love living in this vibrant, lively neighborhood with all the necessities right outside your door and steps away from hotspots like Baby?s All Right, Bembe and Rabbit Hole. Commuting is quick and easy with a short walk to the Marcy JMZ. This beauty won?t last long, so call now!
September 1st move in SMALL pets OK Elevator building On-site super

Super sized 2 bedroom in prime Williamsburg!
- no broker fee
2 nice bedrooms Large living area with windows Stainless steel kitchen Heat and hot water included Exposed brick
Perfect location, near all things that make Williamsburg, Williamsburg! JMZ and G trains nearby. Local hotspots such as L'Industrie Pizzeria, Pies 'n' Thighs, Vanessa's Dumpling House, Banter Bar, Nighthawk Cinema, etc
Available 9/1 Small pets accepted

Myspace Exclusive! Large one bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg ? just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: Hardwood floors, king sized bedroom, ample closet space, large living room and separate kitchen. Pets are welcome. Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
NO BROKER FEE! Small pets OK September 1 move in

Myspace Exclusive!
Virtual tours available! Reside in a gorgeous 2 bed / 1 bath apartment with stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, natural sunlight, modern features, and easy access to trains. To live in Crown Heights is to live in convenience and a diverse community. Enjoy the luxury of having access to most train lines like the 2,3,4,5 and C, or switch to any letter train at Atlantic terminal. Enjoy a short walk to Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park, and Botanic Garden. Crown Heights offers a number of local restaurants and bars like Chavela?s, Dutch Boy, Cent?Anni, Drink Lounge, 99 Rogers, Mayfield, Cafe Rue Dix, Glady?s and more! Easy commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods.
9/1 move in Small pets welcome

Beautifully NEWLY RENOVATED 1 bed in Williamsburg
Located at Rodney and South 4th 3 minutes door to platform ? Marcy JMZ
Brand new renovation with TONS of natural light New kitchen / bath Stainless steel appliances
Located directly at the entrance to the Williamsburg Bridge, this apartment perfect for any commute into the city. 3 blocks from the Marcy JMZ. 10 minute commute into the city. Around the corner from Broadway, which has everything you need.
Heat and Hot water are included This apartment is an amazing deal in this location, do not miss out!
Available 9/1 Small pets welcome

Special price for an 8/1 move in!
Incredible, newly renovated huge 1-bedroom in Williamsburg right off the subway in Prime Williamsburg! Right by the waterfront.
Oak hardwood floors, high ceilings, and large windows letting in tons of natural light! Nice L-shaped living/dining area, creating 2 separate spaces.
- Big bedroom with closet - Renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, microwave - Elevator building - On-Site Super
JMZ trains, Domino Park, Peter Luger's, Pies-N-Thighs, Social House Cafe, Deux Chats, Patrizia's of Williamsburg, etc nearby.
No broker fee Available now Small pets welcome

Gorgeous two bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg - just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains. Could also be used a 1 bedroom plus home office. The apartment features: Hardwood floors, Spacious et-in style kitchen with stainless steel appliances, Large living room, 1 queen size and 1 twin size bedroom. Heat & Hot Water is included and there is rooftop access. Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
September 1 move in Small pets OK No broker fee

Myspace Exclusive!
Gorgeous Junior two bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg ? just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: hardwood floors, spacious kitchen with stainless steel appliances, large living room, 1 queen size bedroom and 1 full size bedroom. Heat & Hot Water is included. Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
Available 8/1 Small pets OK Broker fee applies

- Located at Clarkson & East 46t Street ? In a well-maintained, secured entry building with an elevator. ? Close to Kingsbrook and Kings County Hospital. ? It's a short bus ride to the 2, 3, 4, & 5 train. ? Lots of natural sunlight, good closet space ? Super and laundry on site

- Located at Clarkson & East 46t Street ? In a well-maintained, secured entry building with an elevator. ? Close to Kingsbrook and Kings County Hospital. ? It's a short bus ride to the 2, 3, 4, & 5 train. ? Lots of natural sunlight, good closet space ? Super and laundry on site

Nice 3 bed just 1 block from PROSPECT PARK!!
- Hardwood Floors Throughout - 3 Great Sized Bedrooms - Separate Living Room - Small Pets Welcome - Heat/Hot Water Included
You will not beat this apartment. The B/Q train is literally around the corner and so it PROSPECT PARK!! The neighborhood is so great with bars, grocery, and restaurants everywhere. These apartment don?t last long so take a look today.
Small pets OK Available now

No need to choose between Bushwick and BedStuy with this one! Live right on that line and enjoy one of the quickest growing and most popular neighborhoods today. With all the conveniences of and Broadway right outside and Myrtle Avenue just down the street, you'll have everything you need nearby. Quickly walk to a HUGE grocer (such a luxury in Brooklyn), bars and restaurants galore, and the easiest transportation ever! Conveniently located off the J and M trains as well as the B15, B38, B46, B47, and B54 bus routes. FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Excellent Natural Light! Shared Laundry Room Shared Roof Deck Bike Storage Parking (by availability) Pet Friendly for only $50/month!!

ONE-OF-A-KIND 1 bed / 1 bath TRIPLEX with large private roof terrace! TWENTY NINE FOOT HIGH ceilings with original brick detail throughout and the church?s original 120-year-old hand-painted tin ceiling!! Vaulted ceilings in this historic church building give it a large open feel. Must see in person to get the full size.
If you can?t see the video please let me know and I?ll text it to you
Unit features: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Microwave Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Large private terrace Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in both rooms. Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment Spacious bedrooms and living room Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closet if needed
Building features: Garage parking ButterflyMX intercom Multiple laundry rooms Huge Roof deck Zipcars available Bike storage Go Lockers for shipping and receiving packages securely State-of-the-art security system throughout Fantastic location close to tons of local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train. There is an elevator to the roof shared roof deck but not to the apartment because there is no elevator in this part of the building. Up 2 flights. 4 laundry rooms , one on each floor.
Pets ok No fee . Guarantors welcome. $20 app fee Call or text to view the right away. This is priced to GO!

3 room / 1 bath PENTHOUSE with private roof deck! Lots of light in this unit, vaulted ceilings too. Skylights Laundry in building Its? a 4th floor walkup, no elevator. Gorgeous apartment.
Pets ok NO fee Call or text to set up viewing right away!

2 Bed / 1bath with private balcony, in a brand new elevator building!
Unit features: Private balcony Bedrooms on opposite sides of the large living room Faces the back of the building away from any street noise Sunny 4th floor apartment Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in all rooms. Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closets
Building features: Affordable parking spots available ButterflyMX intercom Multiple laundry rooms Huge Roof deck Zipcars available Bike storage State-of-the-art security system throughout
Fantastic location close to tons of local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train.
Pets ok No fee Just 1st and security to move in
Call or text to view the right away!

SUNNY 2 bed / 1 bath in an elevator building with windows in every room Facing the City and the building?s internal courtyard! Tons of natural light coming into all areas of the apt. New construction built into what used to be a school attached a renovated 145yo church converted into apartments.
Video link is on StreetEasy. If you can?t see the video link , let me know and I?ll send it to you. This is of the actual unit. 1st 30 seconds of the video are of the building, Unit video starts at 34seconds in just fyi.
This 2br but has beautiful finishes and lots of natural light. Owner will purchase standing closets for the bedrooms if needed.
Unit features: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in both rooms. Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment Boxed layout 2 true bedroom Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closet for the bedroom
Building features: ButterflyMX intercom Laundry room Huge Roof deck Parking (based on availability) Zipcars available Bike storage Go Lockers for shipping and receiving packages securely State-of-the-art security system throughout
Fantastic location close to tons of local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train.
NO BROKER FEE!! Just 1st and security to move in! Pets ok!
Contact us to set up a viewing right away!!

Beautiful 2.5BR/1.5bath duplex with private yard!!
Looking for tons of space? This could be a 3br or a huge 2br plus basement level. The yard is private to this apartment Spiral staircase going downstairs. Additional set of stairs to the basement level with a door to basement level for easier moving of large items. Hardwood floors Laundry in the building Next to both L and M trains Video and pics of actual unit. If you can?t see the video let me know and I?ll sent it to you. Currently tenant occupied until end of the month.
Pets ok No fee Only First & Security to move in
Contact to schedule your appointment today!

Brand new 2.5 room / 1 bath with central air! Tons of light and high ceilings in this unit. Just one block from Myrtle/Wyckoff L/M stop! Laundry in the basement, LATCH smartlocks on all doors in the building!
This has been used as a 3br in the past but owners have dropped the price and advertising as a 2br. The 3br room has french doors that open to the living room area.
Please call or text to take a look today!

Beautiful 1.5 bedroom apartment nestled in the heart of Bushwick. The unit features an open stainless steel kitchen with a plenty of storage along with a spacious living area perfect for entertaining. Huge shared courtyard for the building with bike storage and plenty of room for bringing friends over for summer time BBQ hang. Lots of closet space! Also for those that can?t live without their furry friends, the building allows pets. Located just a couple blocks from the M and L trains with choice spots for shopping, brunch and a night out all close by.
No Fee
Call or text to take a look right away!

2 Bed / 1bath with private balcony, in a brand new elevator building!
Unit features: Private balcony Bedrooms on opposite sides of the large living room Faces the back of the building away from any street noise Sunny 4th floor apartment Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in all rooms. Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closets

Fantastic location close to tons of local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train.
Pets ok No fee Just 1st and security to move in
Call or text to view the right away!

Live next to the action in this 2 bedroom apartment located in prime downtown Bushwick! Stunning unit in a very convenient location and borderline East Williamsburg. Only 1 block away from the L Jefferson for a reduced commute, and next to Bushwick's popular restaurants: Cafe Ghia, Bunna Cafe, Mominette Bistro! Laundry in building for your convenience & pet friendly building too!

SUNNY 1 bed / 1 bath in an elevator building. Facing the City and the building?s internal courtyard! Tons of natural light coming into all areas of the apt. New construction built into what used to be a school attached a renovated 145yo church converted into apartments.
This spacious 1br but has beautiful finishes and lots of natural light.
Unit features: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in both rooms. Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closet for the bedroom

2br / 1bath with laundry in the building and roof deck! Huge windows in the bedrooms (south facing) Cutout window to bring more light into the large living room Butcher block countertops Hardwood floors Dishwasher Microwave Roof deck Laundry in the building Faces away from the street
NO fee Pets ok Just 1st and security to move in Call or text to see right away!

4 bedroom / 1 bath in a fantastic location on Troutman St! Huge apartment covers the entire first floor. There is a common backyard just outside the apartment, but there are only 5 apartments in the building. Laundry in the building This is a true 4br with large living room!
See video!
No Fee! Just 1st and security Pets ok Call or text to view right away

Chic 2.5 Bedroom Apartment with massive private balcony right in the Heart of Bushwick! Owner will also purchase standing closets if you want. One bedroom is smaller with a window bringing light in from the back bedroom. It's perfect as an office / extra common space , or as a small 3rd bedroom for someone who's budget is less. See video for layout . 1min walk to the Dekalb L. 5min to the M train.
Featuring: -Private Balcony with access from both bedrooms - Large Open Living Room - Queen Size Bedrooms - Stainless Steel Appliances - Including Dishwasher - And Microwave! - Laundry in Building - Large windows - Plenty of sunlight! - Elevator - 2 huge Roof decks - Off street Parking with Bluetooth door opener ? Designated parking spots $250/mo - Zipcar in Garage
Such a great location, with tons of cafe?s, bars and restaurants within a five minute walk! Variety Coffee, Taquiera Cocoyoc, Milk and Pull, The Johnson?s, Maria Hernandez Park, and many more!
Just first and security to move in. NO BROKER FEE!! Call or text to set up viewing right away.

Huge renovated 2.5br. These have been used at 3brs in the past and each room has a private entrance and window but very little common space. Works a lot better as a large 2br with one of the additional rooms used as common space. You?ll get a sense of the space by seeing the video. If you can?t see it, please see the listing on StreetEasy or text me and I can send it to you. note . the apartment is unfurnished and do not come with bed frames show in photos
This apt is beautifully renovated with: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Windows in all bedrooms plus a small skylight in the living room Heat/AC units in each room allowing you to control temp per room (huge savings on utilities) Laundry in the building Owner will purchase standing closets if needed. Fantastic locations with tons of local spots to enjoy Located 2min walk to L and M train lines in prime Bushwick (myrtle/wyckoff stop of L/M)
Pets ok No broker fee Just 1st and security to move in
Call or text to take a look right away!

Welcome to 487 Keap, a brand new rental building seconds to Metropolitan/Union Avenue L train Very well maintained ? beautiful common areas including a landscaped roof deck with lounge chairs, bar, and outdoor shower. Full service and spacious gym, bike and additional storage are available.
This apartment is rent stabilized, you can enjoy a rent stabilized home, be protected from sharp increases in rent and have the right to renew your lease for years to come.

Do not miss out on this 3BR/1baths apartment in Brooklyn's up and coming neighborhood Prospect Lefferts Gardens! People forget that Brooklyn is the biggest borough and offers some of the best, historic architecture. Enjoy the neighborhoods easy access to the B,Q,2,3 lines, a number of bus lines, and short walk to Prospect Park. Live within steps to juice bars, grocery stores, restaurants, coffee shops, bars, pharmacies, banks, local bakeries, and more to explore. Brooklyn Greenery, MIdwood Flats, Irv's, Bluebird, Blessings, and Food Sermon are just a couple of the many options to check out in this vibrant neighborhood.Easy commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

Virtual tours available!
Beautiful apartment in East Williamsburg, prime location!
This apartment features spacious living room, queen sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout.
You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Roberta's, Sweet Science, Honey's, Wayward Social, Syndicated, Guadalupe, Reclamation, Ichiran, Momo Sushi Shack, El Cortez.
Short commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

Virtual tours available!Beautiful apartment in Greenpoint, prime location!This apartment features a spacious living room, 1 queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, 1 modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You'll be right around the corner from McCarren & McGolrick Parks, in addition to dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Keg & Lantern, Brooklyn Barge, TORST, Spritzenha, Northern Territory, Five Leaves, Enid's, Paulie Gee's, Sauvage, Milk & Roses, Calexico.mShort commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)
Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.

Welcome to Casa Hope Williamsburg?s new luxury development!
Sunny units with oversized windows throughout, and gorgeous finishes Steps from the L / G trains, commute to Union Square in only 13 minutes door to door!
Tons of building amenities:
Fitness center Rooftop terrace Business center On-site garage parking Lounge on 7th floor Mini lounge nook to each floor Elevator Bike room Parking garage (additional fee)
The kitchen comes equipped with brand new stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. Gorgeous well-designed light wood cabinetry, white stone countertops and backsplashes. Modern bathrooms feature a deep soaking spa bathtub, as well as modern vanity with oversized mirror, storage cabinet space and matte black finishes. Other features include oak flooring throughout and generous closet space. Trash Chute to each floor.
Perfect location with an easy commute to the city and tons of restaurants, bars and cafes nearby Short walk from McCarren Park and the Bedford L train area

Experience Brooklyn living at 1010 Pacific St. You?ll find this community in the Prospect Heights area of Brooklyn. Experience a new standard at 1010 Pacific St.
Pacific House offers a collection of Studio, 1 and 2 Bedroom luxury apartments featuring expansive, open- concept layouts, oak floors and contemporary finishes. Residents also enjoy unparalleled access to first-class amenities, including fitness center, dedicated kids? areas, media lounge and bar and an expansive roof top with view of the city. Pacific House is centrally located in the heart of Brooklyn?s trendy prospect park neighborhood, and in close proximity to major transit hubs and an array of local amenities. Nearby shops, restaurants, schools, outdoor parks, neighborhood services, arts and culture are all within easy reach.

2 Bed / 1 Bath at 639 Foster Ave ? Unit 101 in Kensington, Brooklyn. All Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations: Newkirk Plaza (B, Q), Avenue H (Q), 18 Av (F).
This stunning, large, and spacious apartment offers plenty of sunlight and modern amenities. The kitchen is equipped with stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher and microwave. The beautifully tiled bathroom features a vanity and mirror. The apartment includes split units for A/C and heating, and access to a rooftop. On-site laundry is available.
Amenities include:
Central A/C High Ceilings Hardwood Floors Natural Light in Living Area Laundry in Building Bike Storage Roof Access Skyline View Gym Elevator

I have a beautiful garden level 2 bedroom 1 bathroom with Shared Yard with upstairs and In Unit Laundry.

Charming 3 bedroom/1.5 bathroom on a quiet tree - lined street in Ridgewood! You are minutes away from your local pierogi shop, grocery store, and plenty of family-style restaurants and cafe's. The apartment features: - High ceilings with large windows to bring in tons of sunlight!- Stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and microwave- Large living room and central air throughout the apartment- Queen sized bedrooms all with ample closet space and large windows Just first and security to move in!

Discover your new home at 31-19 37th St, a place where comfort and style meet in perfect harmony. This stunning industrial-chic apartment offers three sunlit bedrooms in a building filled with modern amenities. Experience the charm of historic Astoria while enjoying conveniences such as an elevator, a laundry room, a residents' lounge, and a fully furnished rooftop with breathtaking views of the Manhattan skyline. With easy access to the N/Q lines at Broadway and the R/M lines at Steinway, you'll be just 20 minutes away from Midtown.

Welcome to 2 Stanwix 2R/2A in Brooklyn, NY! This stunning 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment offers a spacious and bright living space, perfect for comfortable urban living. Conveniently located just two blocks away from the Myrtle Av Station (J + M + Z) and within half a mile of the Morgan Av Station (L), this newly renovated unit is situated at the border of Bushwick and Williamsburg, offering the best of both vibrant neighborhoods. With its prime location, you can reach Manhattan in just 20 minutes.
Inside the apartment, you'll find modern amenities that enhance your lifestyle. The kitchen features a dishwasher, making meal preparation and cleanup a breeze. Whether you're a foodie or enjoy hosting dinner parties, this convenient appliance adds a touch of convenience to your daily routine.
Furthermore, pet owners will be delighted to know that pets are allowed in the building, making it a welcoming and inclusive community for furry friends. The building itself offers additional amenities to enhance your living experience. Laundry facilities are conveniently located within the building, ensuring you can easily take care of your laundry needs without leaving the premises. Additionally, a virtual doorman service provides an added layer of security and convenience, allowing you to feel safe and secure in your new home.
With its spacious layout, desirable location, and modern amenities, 2 Stanwix 2R/2A is the perfect place to call home for those seeking a comfortable and convenient living experience in Brooklyn, NY.

3br/1bth! Quiet convenience is the name of the game! Just a couple blocks off Myrtle-Wyckoff means restaurants, bars, coffee, FULL SIZE grocers (a borderline luxury in NYC), bodegas galore, and so much intersecting transportation! The list goes on as to why this neighborhood is one of the best in North Brooklyn. The greatest part of it all is that somehow, even with all that happening just around the corner, you can find a quiet calmness on these side streets. You'll really have it all!
Conveniently located off the L and M trains, as well as the B13, B26, B52, B54, B60, Q55, and Q58 bus lines.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen
Central A/C and heat
BUILDING FEATURES: Laundry Room
First & Security NO FEE

This Ridgewood neighborhood backs right up to Bushwick, serving as it's older and wiser sibling. You can enjoy all of the same delicious cuisine, fair trade hot (and necessary) coffee, unique locally owned businesses, bodegas and grocers, and centralized transportation as it's neighboring Brooklyn areas.
Experience that side of life while also keeping that lovely community feel of the slightly more residential and peaceful Queens existence. You can have it both ways! Now top that all off with the fact this quiet building only has 6 units!! *long exhale* now that's the right choice. Conveniently located off the M and L trains, as well as the B13, B20, B38, and Q39, and Q58 bus lines.
Pet Friendly No Fee First and security to move in!

Visit trusted long-standing dive bars next to upscale cocktail clubs. Go shopping all along Graham and Flushing Avenues and take a short walk to both Williamsburg AND BedStuy!

Reside in a gorgeous studio apartment with stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, natural sunlight, modern features, and easy access to trains. Live within steps to juice bars, grocery stores, restaurants, coffee shops, bars, pharmacies, banks, local bakeries, and more to explore.
